title: Go for Windows installer in MSI format
body:
What do you see instead?

Only .exe installer available for download. Need Windows installer in .MSI format.


Which operating system are you using?

Windows

Please provide any additional information below.

Some enterprise IT(R1) only allow Windows program in MSI package format to be installed
on production Windows box. To spread Go for  Windows into enterprise windows boxes, we
should provide Go for windows installer in MSI format also.

I can provide the initial WiX package source for creating Go MSI. 

Reference: 
R1.  http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6245260/installers-wix-or-inno-setup
